overview: Xiao Xiaolan (胥明文饰) took time off when he was a soldier and met Wei Gui (Yi Li ornaments) and was rescued by hooligans. Later, because Xiao Xiaoyu did not intend to get an unknown U disk, it caused a fight against the underworld. The underworld leader is the brother of his beloved girlfriend Wei Gui (Yi Li ornaments), and the patriotic Xiao Xiaoying chose to stand on the side of justice and fight against the underworld.
title: 战王
